synopsis.text:
Five powerful gangs wreak havoc in the once-peaceful land of Chungwon, with the Camellia Blossoms emerging as the most dominant. Amidst the chaos, the government struggles to maintain order, while the economy crumbles under the weight of counterfeit gold coins circulated by the ruthless gang. As hope dwindles, a glimmer arises in the form of a mysterious hero known as the Red Hawk.

Among the Camellia Blossoms, a group of elite martial artists called the Five Dragons strike fear into the hearts of the innocent. However, one of their youngest members, Danyoung, grows weary of the destruction and decides to rebel. With his brother's help, he narrowly escapes death, but at a great cost.

Three years later, the counterfeit coins continue to plague the villagers. When a craftsman's life is claimed, his daughter and her lover, Junchung, become suspicious and embark on a journey to uncover the truth. Alongside a mysterious ally named Yungyung, they search for answers and cross paths with the enigmatic Red Hawk.

With the future of Chungwon hanging in the balance, the legendary Red Hawk stands as the people's last hope against the tyranny of the Camellia Blossoms and their malevolent Five Dragons.
